title: If Two Stores Hire People at $15/hr Sell the Same Things
body:
Their location is about 5mins apart as well. However, store A sells it cheaper at equal or superior service/quality than store B. Which store would you go to?

Assuming that all products are made overseas by the same manufacturer where labor costs have not significantly increased, what type of ways can you think of for store A to sell at a lower margin or even at a lost?
